name: Minesweeper Reborn
description:
Minesweeper Reborn is a new minesweeper game with a new mind-blowing feature: in one cell there could be up to 3 mines! This increases the difficulty level of the game, if you are a fan of the classic minesweeper, you will definitely fall in love with Minesweeper Reborn.

The UI it's entirely redesigned with a new modern and minimalistic style!

FEATURES
● Classic and Reborn gamemodes

● 3 difficulties

● Online & Offline Highscores

● Achievements

● Nice and clean interface

● Flag tiles with long tap
